page.title: 03Pevensey Castle
page.content: Pevensey castle is one of the most famous landmarks in Britain,and the oldest castle in Sussex.It was built as a fort by the Romans,who named it {Anderita}in 340 A.D.to defend the coast from raiding Saxons.Historically important as being near the site where {William of Normandy}landed in 1066,was given by William to his half-brother {Robert of Mortain,}who made a smaller castle inside the Roman wall with a moat and keep.The castle is made of Roman tiles,sandstone,ironstone and flint.It is the only castle in Britain to have been repeatedly used for defence through the ages;Roman and Norman times,during the Armada threat in Elizabethan England and in the 2nd world war when it was used as a command and observation post by allied forces until 1949.
